Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 0, 0 = Poor surgery candidate | 1, 1 = Borderline candidate acceptable under some conditions | 2, 2 = Acceptable with some reservations | 3, 3 = Good candidate | 4, 4 = Excellent candidate
